subject: Simsonn Plus X pedas - Le Mans Ultimate
description_text:
Hello,

First of all I want to say that I and both my friends are very happy with
our new Simsonn Plus X pedals and the haptics. They look and feel great and
we are already noticing improvements in our sim racing performance with
just a few days of use.

However, the game that we play most is Le Mans Ultimate and the Simsonn
software shows a message that "Telemetry is not connected". This makes the
haptics to not work properly with your software. We are now relying in a
third party software, SimHiub, to get the correct inputs for the haptics.
Software is a very important part of the sim racing gear and I hope you can
fix this soon (SimHub is not always a stable software).

I also will leave soon a review at your site.

Best regards,
Jo√£o Oliveira

conversations.body_text: Hi Joao Oliveira,    Thank you for your suggestion. We are progressively completing this task. Due to the sheer volume of simulation racing games available, our engineers must manually gather data from each title individually. This represents a substantial workload, necessitating a step-by-step approach to refinement. In the meantime, you may utilise Simhub for haptics control. We appreciate your feedback and comments!
